description:
Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!
Choose between a one-month subscription or auto-renewal subscription to enjoy special LIVE benefits (currently only available in limited regions)

Note: 
If you subscribe via Apple, payment will be charged to App Store Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of Service —
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy —
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/privacy-policy

Buz TV - Movies & TV Shows is an unofficial informational tool that helps you stay up to date with movie and TV release dates.
You cannot watch or stream content in this app — Tubee is strictly for tracking and discovery.

Quickly find upcoming release dates, get notified about schedule changes, follow your favorite actors, and stay informed about the entertainment you love.

With Buz TV, you’ll always be the first to know when a new season or episode is announced!

---

##  Features

*  Set Reminders for your favorite series and movie release dates.
*  Notifications for new seasons, episodes, and production changes.
*  Follow Actors and get notified about new shows and movies they’re in.
*  Smart Subscriptions to help you save on streaming services.
*  Track Watched Progress for your movies and TV shows.
*  Favorites List for easy access to shows and movies you love.
*  Watch Trailers directly in the app.
*  Browse & Search by title, popularity, rating, or release date.
*  Filter Content by type (Series, Movies, Documentaries) or upcoming release dates.
*  Chat & Discuss your favorite shows, seasons, and episodes with the community.

---

## Subscription Info

Tubee is free with ads. Upgrade to Tubee Pro to:

* Remove ads
* Unlock Smart Subscriptions
* Get Premium Notifications
* Access unlimited favorites and follows

Please note: Tubee Pro does not provide streaming. It’s an informational upgrade only.

Subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage or cancel auto-renewal anytime in your iTunes Store account settings.

---

## Credits

All metadata, artwork, and images are sourced from TMDb (The Movie Database), a community-maintained movie and TV database.

---

## Disclaimer

Tubee is an independent app and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or associated with any streaming service or company.

Tubee does not stream or connect to any streaming provider. It is an informational tool only.

Privacy Policy:- https://flicksriot.blogspot.com/2025/08/privacy-policy.html

EULA:-
https://flicksriot.blogspot.com/2025/08/eula.html

Contact US:- ameliaross9898@gmail.com

description:

Smart Discovery & Exploration
Dive into a vast collection of movies with rich details on cast, crew, genres, and more.

Accurate, Real-Time Data
Access comprehensive and up-to-date information directly from the trusted themoviedb.org database.

Release Dates & Trailers
Plan your movie nights effortlessly by browsing release dates and watching trailers—all within the app.

Personalized Watchlist
Keep track of movies you want to see by curating your own custom watchlist.

Streamlined & Intuitive Interface
Navigate effortlessly through a clean, modern design that makes movie discovery a breeze.

No Account Required
HL TV respects your privacy—no sign-up, login, or personal information is needed to enjoy the app’s core features.

اكتشف تجربة مشاهدة متكاملة مع تطبيق قصة عشق، المنصة العربية العصرية التي تجمع بين التكنولوجيا الذكية والمحتوى الغني لتلبية شغف عشاق السينما والتلفاز. بفضل تصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام، يوفّر لك التطبيق قصه عشق مسلسلات تركيه كل ما تحتاجه لاستكشاف أحدث وأشهر الأعمال من تركيا، الوطن العربي، آسيا، والعالم أجمع.

نحن لسنا مجرد تطبيق تتبع عادي. نحن رحلتك الرومانسية في عالم الدراما، حيث كل فيلم قصة حب، وكل مسلسل مغامرة عاطفية. دع عجلة تقودك لاكتشاف دراما تلامس قلبك!

هل تحتار في اختيار فيلم أو مسلسل لمشاهدته الليلة؟ دع عجلة الساحرة تختار لك! تطبيق متكامل يجمع بين تتبع الأفلام والمسلسلات مع لمسة رومانسية فريدة.


المميزات الرئيسية:

عجلة السحرية


دوّر العجلة واترك الحظ يختار دراما الليلة

رسوم متحركة ساحرة ومؤثرات احتفالية

اختيار ذكي من قائمتك المفضلة


مكتبة شاملة للأفلام والمسلسلات


تصفح آلاف الأفلام والمسلسلات

معلومات مفصلة مع التقييمات والمراجعات

تصنيفات متنوعة: رائجة، شعبية، الأعلى تقييماً

بحث سريع ودقيق


تنظيم مثالي لقوائمك


قائمة المفضلة لأجمل ما شاهدت

قائمة المشاهدة لما تنوي مشاهدته

تتبع ما شاهدته بالفعل

إحصائيات شخصية مفصلة


اختبار المعرفة السينمائية


اختبر معرفتك بعالم السينما والدراما

أسئلة متنوعة وممتعة

تحديات يومية ونقاط تنافسية

شارك نتائجك مع أصدقائك



واجهة داكنة أنيقة وعصرية

ألوان حمراء دافئة تعكس

تجربة مستخدم سلسة وممتعة

دعم كامل للغة العربية


تحديثات مستمرة


محتوى محدث يومياً

أحدث الإصدارات السينمائية

تنبيهات للحلقات الجديدة


لماذا عجلة؟

نحن لسنا مجرد تطبيق تتبع عادي. نحن رحلتك الرومانسية في عالم الدراما، حيث كل فيلم قصة حب، وكل مسلسل مغامرة عاطفية. دع عجلة تقودك لاكتشاف دراما تلامس قلبك!

حمّل التطبيق الآن وابدأ رحلتك في عالم السينمائي!

اكتشف تجربة مشاهدة متكاملة مع تطبيق قصة عشق، المنصة العربية العصرية التي تجمع بين التكنولوجيا الذكية والمحتوى الغني لتلبية شغف عشاق السينما والتلفاز. بفضل تصميم أنيق وواجهة سهلة الاستخدام، يوفّر لك التطبيق قصه عشق مسلسلات تركيه كل ما تحتاجه لاستكشاف أحدث وأشهر الأعمال من تركيا، الوطن العربي، آسيا، والعالم أجمع.

أبرز المزايا:
استكشاف المحتوى بسهولة: تصفّح أحدث الأفلام والمسلسلات العربية، التركية، مسلسلات كورية، والآسيوية، مترجمة ومدبلجة بجودة عالية.

توصيات ذكية: يقدّم لك التطبيق اقتراحات مخصصة تناسب ذوقك بناءً على تفاعلاتك.

تقييمات ومراجعات: اطّلع على آراء المستخدمين، شارك تقييماتك، وتعرّف على أفضل الأعمال.

تصنيفات متنوعة: أكشن، دراما، كوميديا، أنيميشن، عائلي، والكثير من التصنيفات التي تناسب جميع الأذواق.

دليل شامل للمحتوى الرمضاني والعربي: معلومات محدثة حول أبرز مسلسلات رمضان والأعمال الكلاسيكية والمعاصرة.

قائمة مشاهداتي: أنشئ قائمة خاصة بك لتتبع ما شاهدته وما ترغب بمشاهدته لاحقًا.

تنويه هام:

تطبيق موقع قصة عشق مخصص لاستعراض وتصفح معلومات الأفلام والمسلسلات فقط. وجميع الحقوق محفوظة لأصحابها الأصليين.
تم تصميم التطبيق بهدف تقديم معلومات محدثة وشاملة حول الأعمال السينمائية والتلفزيونية الجديدة والكلاسيكية من مصادر متنوعة وموثوقة.


SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION:

- Title: عجلة تتبع دراما Premium

- Length: Weekly ($3.99), Monthly ($5.99), or

Lifetime ($9.99)

- Content: Unlimited access to all premium features including ad-free experience, unlimited lives, double points, exclusive themes, and advanced statistics

- Auto-renewable subscription

- Payment charged to iTunes Account at confirmation

- Subscription renews automatically unless cancelled 24+ hours before period ends

- Manage subscriptions in Account Settings

What makes 'Joy Awards' truly special, as it does every year, is that the winners are chosen by the fans who love and cherish them. With the 'Joy Awards' App, it's you who will nominate and vote for your beloved stars and releases in Music, Cinema, Series, Directors, Sports, and Influencers, all for free!



You will nominate and cast your votes in two phases:




First Phase: Nominating Your Favorite Stars and Releases
In the nomination phase, which lasts for one month, you play a crucial role in shaping the competition. 
Here's where YOU come in – choose your favorite nominee from the names or titles listed in each category. If your top pick isn't there, don't worry! You have the chance to add your own favorite name or title, as long as it meets the terms and conditions: it should be a release or achievement from 2025. 
During the nomination phase, you can nominate only once for each category.
This phase eventually leads to the selection of the top four final nominees in each category, representing the stars and releases with the most nominations.
 
Second Phase: Voting for Your Favorite Stars and Releases
After the nominations have been counted, the voting phase begins with the top four nominees in each category, which also spans one month.
Here's where YOU make the difference – cast your votes for your favorite nominees. 
And a month later, the voting counts are gathered, leading to the grand reveal of the winners during the live "Joy Awards 2026" ceremony in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
During the voting phase, you can vote only once for each category.

Create your very own Barbie DreamHouse experience! Join us for a bunch of fun activities: baking, cooking, dancing, makeovers, home design, fashion, nail salon, hair salon, mini games or epic pool parties! Explore Malibu with my pink convertible or dress me and my friends up in fashion-forward looks to get picture ready! 
Follow us on exciting adventures in the DreamHouse where anything is possible! 

LET'S MOVE IN
Are you into home design makeovers? Help me design every room with wonderful wallpapers and dazzling decorations. Make it your own Dreamhouse! 

THE COOLEST FRIENDS
Meet my best friends: Barbie "Brooklyn" Roberts, Renee, a sports fanatic; Daisy, a talented DJ; Teresa, a science-lover; Nikki, an aspiring fashion designer and the one-and-only Ken. Plus, my family including my fun-loving sisters: Skipper, Stacie and Chelsea! Even my parents, Mr. and Mrs. Roberts are joining in on the adventure! 

COOKING AND BAKING
Why don’t you join me in my awesome kitchen? There are so many delicious recipes to cook! Get baking with Skipper and post your tasty recipes on BarbieGram for everyone to see! Mmm… Are those cupcakes I smell?! 

DRESS UP
Got any fashion tips? Dress-up in beautiful princess dresses or relax in super comfy pj’s, there’s an outfit for everyone! 

HAIRSTYLES 
Get ready for a makeover! There’s a hair salon in the DreamHouse and you can design tons of different hairstyles! Have a girls makeover day with Teresa and check out all the cool accessories you can add to your new look! 

TIME FOR SOME PAMPERING
Check out the Malibu Nail Spa! Make it a girl’s day out! Create your own nail design at the Nail Salon with so many colors, patterns and stickers to choose from!

SUMMER TIME
OMG! Malibu Beach is finally open! Dive, swim, grill, lounge or build a sandcastle? You can do it all! Decide who is the ultimate surf champion in an awesome mini game. You can also chill out at the DreamHouse pool while Ken throws one of his legendary pool parties! 

PRINCESS ADVENTURE
You are cordially invited to a special event in Malibu: A Royal Ball at the Floravian Castle! Get my friends and sisters princess-ready with fun hairstyles and gowns to become the queen of the ball!

Fun games for girls and boys, pre teens, kids and all ages. Play doll house games with parents or other family members.

- This app may offer weekly or monthly subscriptions
- Payment will be charged to your Apple ID Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period 
- You can cancel your subscription at any time, but please note that you will not get a refund for any remaining period of a subscription
- Users may be offered a free trial of the subscription
- One free trial per account, on new subscriptions only
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription

PRIVACY & ADVERTISING
Budge Studios™ takes children's privacy seriously and ensures that its apps are compliant with privacy laws. This application has received the “ESRB Privacy Certified Kids’ Privacy Seal”.
